item.title: Nancy add a quote by Jennifer Egan
item.description: "It's turning out to be a bad day, a day when the sun feels like teeth." -- Jennifer Egan

item.title: Nancy add a quote by A. A. Milne
item.description: "It is more fun to talk with someone who doesn't use long, difficult words but rather short, easy words like "What about lunch?" -- A. A. Milne

item.title: Nancy add a quote by A.A. Milne
Nancy add a quote by Lorrie Moore
item.description: "There were moments bristling with deadness, when she looked out at her life and went, "<i>What?</i>" Or worse, feeling interrupted and tired, "Whaâ€”?" -- Lorrie Moore

item.title: Nancy add a quote by Lorrie Moore
item.description: "I feared Sarah was one of those women who instead of laughing said, "That's funny," or instead of smiling said, "That's interesting," or instead of saying, "You are a stupid blithering idiot," said, "Well I think it's a little more complicated than that." -- Lorrie Moore
